pr_title: 2200: Moving Rank System Name to Data

timeline.message: Moving ranks to their own folder
Moving ranks system names to the Rank XML file

timeline.bodyText:
Honestly I think we can delete this old migration and its associated code.
Thoughts @HammerGS @neoancient ?
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: I agree. We might want to decide on a policy, but I would say anything older than the previous stable version can be considered obsolete.
replies.author: neoancient

timeline.bodyText: Another spot where I think we can shed some oldancient migration code.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables
